page.title: 14Interesting People Gorton 2
page.content: The second person that I interviewed had lived in Gorton for 70 years. The biggest change that he notices is the disappearance of the engineering works.The memory of the past that sticks most clearly in his mind was the large number of workers leaving Gorton Station early in the morning to go to work in the Gorton Tank Works. He worked at B&S Massey with over 600 others for 49 years. It does not exist any more.He feels that people's attitudes have changed and that there is now very little community spirit compared with the past.Unemployment has split up families and friendships as people have been uprooted.Even so he would not leave the area because he wanted to stay with his family and grandchildren.
